title: Society – Political Party of the Successors of Kapodistrias
text:
The Society – Political Party of the Successors of Kapodistrias () is a eurosceptic <a href="Greece">Greek</a> <a href="Conservatism">conservative</a>, <a href="Patriotism">patriotic</a> political party headed by Michalis Iliadis. It was founded in 2008 by Emmanouil Voloudakis and first participated in the <a href="2009%20European%20Parliament%20election%20in%20Greece">European Parliament election</a> in 2009 with a score of 0.16%. In the <a href="2010%20Greek%20local%20elections">2010 Greek local elections</a> the party supported the "Society of Athens" for the <a href="municipality%20of%20Athens">municipality of Athens</a>.
The party's name refers to <a href="Ioannis%20Kapodistrias">Ioannis Kapodistrias</a>.
